recipe_name: Quinoa Salad with Broccoli, Nuts, and Pomegranate
ingredients: 2 cups water, 1 cup quinoa, 1 cube vegetable bouillon, 2 cups broccoli florets,   +   1/2 cup finely diced red onion,   +   1/2 cup finely chopped Brazil nuts, 1 large pomegranate, seeded, 2 tablespoons olive oil, or to taste, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, or to taste, 1 teaspoon honey, or to taste,   salt and ground black pepper to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 22g 28%, Saturated Fat 6g 31%, Sodium 28mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 48g 18%, Dietary Fiber 6g 22%, Total Sugars 16g, Protein 11g, Vitamin C 47mg 235%, Calcium 53mg 4%, Iron 3mg 19%, Potassium 604mg 13%
